gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: CAMP: Mongolia Soil Temperature and Soil Moisture Data Set
CAMP: Mongolia Soil Temperature and Soil Moisture Data Set

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the Coordinated Energy and Water Cycle Observation Project (CEOP) Enhanced Observing Period 3 (EOP-3) and 4 (EOP-4) CEOP Asia-Australia Monsoon Project (CAMP) Mongolia Soil Temperature and Soil Moisture Data Set. This data set contains data from sixteen stations in the CAMP reference site for the CEOP EOP-3 and EOP-4 time period. This dataset contains the entire EOP-3 and EOP-4 time period (i.e., 1 October 2002 through 31 December 2004). This data set contains both ASCII data and netCDF data. The ASCII data file covers the entire time period for all stations. The netCDF data file covers the entire time period with one netCDF file for each station.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: CEOP/EOP-3 Soil Temperature and Soil Moisture (ASCII)
NetCDF: Network Common Data Form for CEOP (application/x-netcdf)

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL MOISTURE/WATER CONTENT
EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL TEMPERATURE

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: These data are restricted by a user agreement: https://data.eol.ucar.edu//file/download/420FD20C175/ceop_policy.html
